title: AI Capstone Project with Deep Learning
about: Apply your deep learning skills in a capstone project. Solve a real-world problem using the tools and techniques learned in previous modules.

topics.name: Project Planning
topics.details: Defining the problem and setting project goals.

topics.name: Model Development
topics.details: Building and training deep learning models for the project.

topics.name: Evaluation & Deployment
topics.details: Evaluating model performance and deploying the solution.

summary: This capstone module allows you to apply deep learning knowledge to a real-world project, from planning to deployment.
